text: faet -ayha almwmn- qrybk haqah min alsilat walsdqt wsayr 'aemal albr, waet alfaqir walmhtaj aldhy ainqatae bih alsabil min alzakat walsdqt, dhlk al'ieta' khayr liladhin yuridun bemlhm wajah allh, waladhin yaemalun hadhih al'aemal wghyrha min 'aemal alkhyr, 'uwlayik hum alfayizun bthwab allah alnnajun min eqabh
